snippet: A timeline of memorable moments involving long putters, including Guan Tianlang’s victory at the Asia-Pacific Amateur Championship using a belly putter.
abstract: A timeline of memorable moments involving long putters, including Guan Tianlang’s victory at the Asia-Pacific Amateur Championship using a belly putter.
